question: The Covid-19 RT-PCR test kits of which Indian company has received validation from Drug Controller of India?
explanation:
“Mylab”, a molecular diagnostic company based at Pune, became the first company in India to get Covid 19 test kits validated by Drug Controller of India.
The validation of the Reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) tests kits developed by the company has been validated by the National Institute of Virology.
